definition: to go on a hunger strike
to cut short/extinct/to disappear/to vanish/absolutely/by no means

sentences.english: All of us hunger-struck last time.
sentences.chinese: 上次我們全都參加了絕食抗議運動。

sentences.english: Because Fang Qiong cheated money, face on Monday, a hunger strike at home.
sentences.chinese: 方瓊因爲被騙了錢，面子上下不來，在家絕食抗議。

sentences.english: To protest against her illegal arrest, Nasrin has gone on several hunger strikes.
sentences.chinese: 爲了抗議自己的非法囚禁，納斯林已經絕食多次。

sentences.english: All the students on hunger strike had to be force-fed.
sentences.chinese: 所有絕食的學生都得強迫進食。

sentences.english: Mr. Hazare launched his first hunger strike, a five-day fast, in April.
sentences.chinese: 哈扎爾於今年4月首次發起爲其5天的絕食抗議。

sentences.english: All the prisoners on hunger strike had to be force-fed.
sentences.chinese: 所有絕食的犯人均需強迫進食。

sentences.english: Officials say some detainees go on and off hunger strike from time to time.
sentences.chinese: 美國官方說，一些在押人員時斷時續地進行絕食。

sentences.english: The giving up of eating shows that they are so unattached to this world that they can choose to give up food.
sentences.chinese: 絕食表明他們看破紅塵，以至於選擇放棄進食。

sentences.english: Consult a doctor or health practitioner who has experience with fasting.
sentences.chinese: 請洽詢有絕食經驗的醫生或顧問。

sentences.english: After not eating for four days, he is found dead in his room.
sentences.chinese: 在絕食四天之後，他被發現死在了自己的房間。

sentences.english: There are at least three students around the world also on hunger strike.
sentences.chinese: 世界各地至少還有三個學生也在進行絕食抗議。

sentences.english: But you can't solve the problem of overeating by stopping eating.
sentences.chinese: 但是你不能通過絕食來解決暴食的問題。

sentences.english: The Balkars went on a hunger strike already about 4 months ago.
sentences.chinese: 大約4個月前巴耳卡爾人就已經開始進行絕食抗議了。

sentences.english: I'd like to see them do the black fast Yom Kippur.
sentences.chinese: 我倒是想看看他們在贖罪日是否嚴格遵守絕食的規定。

sentences.english: They live for about a month meditating and only drinking until they die.
sentences.chinese: 然後，他們絕食，冥想一個月，只喝些水，直至死亡。

sentences.english: In a masterstroke, Anna refused to come out of jail, and continued his fast there.
sentences.chinese: 妙的是，安納拒絕走出監獄，並在裏面繼續他的絕食。

definition: to save food/to go on a diet
to starve to death/to be very hungry
to close the passes/to seal off the country/seclusion (monastic practice, e.g. of Chan Buddhists)
to put on weight/to get fat
to bring to a conclusion/to settle (a dispute)/to do away with (oneself)/to break off (a relationship)/resolution (of a problem)
to stock up/to lay in supplies/to hoard (for speculation)/to corner the market in sth
to stop/to cease/to dismiss/to suspend/to quit/to finish
